Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "Commandant, I'm catching a whiff of various scents.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "In addition to the commandant's scent, there's a whole mix of smellsâ€”foods, fabrics, mechnoids...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'This is a shop here, after all.', 3: '7'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "And there's something special in the air... Commandant, can we go see it together?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Hey, over here, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I'm not quite tall enough. Hold me up, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 reaches up like a kitten, but ends up knocking down a few things.'}
{3: "A box of soap comes crashing down on No. 21's head, prompting her to grab it with both hands."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Ouch! That soap is not behaving!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'What a troublemaker.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Colorful deodorizers fall on the ground.'}
{2: 'So this is what No. 21 called nice-smelling.', 3: '26'}
{3: 'No. 21 picks up a blue-wrapped one and takes a whiff...'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Smells like lilacs in May.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Then, she tries a golden one.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Morning nectar and dew.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'And then, a black item.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Wait, this smells like you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: "On closer inspection, it's not a deodorizer, but a fallen wallet."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Here you go, Commandant. Gotta look after your stuff.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Suddenly on high alert, No. 21's eyes widen."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: "Following No. 21's lead, you stumble upon a children's section awash with crayons."}
{2: 'Quite the connoisseur of scents and colors.', 3: '48'}
{3: "No. 21 snatches up a crayon, swiftly doodling on the shop's proffered paper."}
{3: 'Before you know it, the blank canvas transforms into a scene depicting you and No. 21 hand in hand.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I call this "No. 21 and Good Buddy Playing Together".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Commandant's the good buddy... uh, I mean, a good person.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Commandant, where to next?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 plucks a white wolf cub plushie from a nearby shelf.'}
{2: '(Hand the plushie to No. 21.)', 3: '58'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Sniff, sniff. Clean as a whistle. A gift from you, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I like this gift, because it's like me. It's comforting.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's give it a name.", 3: '63'}
{2: "Let's go for something more affectionate.", 3: '66'}
{2: 'Reusing names could lead to confusion.', 3: '68'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'How about Commandant No. 2?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I feel safe with you by my side, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "But it doesn't quite resemble you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's reconsider.", 3: '73'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I'm not the best at naming things. My suggestions never quite hit the mark. Commandant, perhaps you could choose.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Since it's Valentine's Day, let's call it Vali.", 3: '75'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Vali... sounds fitting. I don't fully understand, but if it pleases you, Commandant, it pleases me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 cradles Vali against her chest.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Vali smells good, just like you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Would you mind spending some time with Vali and me later?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "There's an array of scents in this shop waiting to be explored...", 4: '1'}
